title: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Updating of checkboxes in the Export Zip feature takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update the checked state of the table. During this process, a busy cursor should be shown.
OB: Currently, there is no indication that the system is working, and it takes a long time for the checkboxes to update.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the updating process to indicate that the system is working. Additionally, the checkboxes should update in a timely manner.
SR: 1. Open the Export Zip feature. 2. Check some checkboxes in the table. 3. Observe that the checkboxes take a long time (30 seconds) to update. 4. During this process, check that a busy cursor is displayed. 5. Verify that the checkboxes eventually update properly.
